name: Aurora Ventures
description: $Aura is a decentralized, community-owned platform creating iconic eco stays and hospitality experiences worldwide. Our first build is a one-of-a-kind glass and wood retreat in Guayabo, Costa Rica, with panoramic views of Miravalles Volcano. By holding $Aura tokens, users can own a piece of real-world properties, receive a share of profits, and vote on major project decisions. We will then expand to larger decentralized resorts and eventually a full aquisition fund and decentralized trust.
